patthana22.3:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.3:4.2: Nakusalaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.3:4.3: Naakusalaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana22.3:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
